content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'silver_microdata23_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [silver_microdata23_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://silver@microdata23.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.newcustomers (
	[customer_id] int,
	[first_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[city] nvarchar(4000),
	[state] nvarchar(4000),
	[pincode] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'delta/customers_delta/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_microdata23_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.newcustomers
GO
